message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a living too. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $110 for the product. Can we talk about that?
I understand that you need to make a living, but I'm still looking to save some money. Can we try $105? That's the highest I'm willing to go.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, I've already made a significant concession by offering it for $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to get at least $115 for the product. Can we make it work?
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but I'm really close to walking away. Can we try $112? That's my final offer.
I'm not willing to go below $115, Bob. I've already made several concessions and I'm not willing to give up any more value. My final offer is $115, and that's as low as I can go.
